api_list.name: Tracking ID API
api_list.description: API to check status of the transaction using tracking ID. For every request a Tracking ID numbers is generated

api_list.name: Download error API

required_parameters.name: doc_type
required_parameters.description: Doctype for which file has to be uploaded.

required_parameters.name: upload_date
required_parameters.description: The name of the csv file for which error file is requested.

required_parameters.name: institution_type
required_parameters.description: Type of institution for which data has to be uploaded

required_parameters.name: year_of_exam
required_parameters.description: Year of exam for which file has to be uploaded.
